channel.title: [Refractored] Requesting Title Screen - Error [Refractored]
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape,
I'm trying to make a webclient, I've modified all files to what they need to be, I've made sure I've zipped the cache.zip correctly, I've made sure the cacheDownloader.java is working properly. It all is, The client downloads my cache and extracts it to it's specific folder but for some reason when I run my client It says stops at 'Requesting Title Screen'. I've tried almost everything and can't get it to work. I'm trying to be as most specific as I can to you guys to receive better help but this error seems weird.
Here's the picture of what's going on;
[IMG]http://www.survivalpkz.com/client/error/title.png[/img]
Here's what is inside of my cache.zip;
[IMG]http://www.survivalpkz.com/client/error/cache.png[/img]
I'd be greatly appreciative if someone could fix this for me because I've been stuck on it for about 3 days.
Thanks,
Skyro. :)

[quote=“Skyro, post:6, topic:445238”][quote author=t4 link=topic=547921.msg4021557#msg4021557 date=1340051420]
paste the code for the downloader/extractor and the surrounding code of the where the print method for “Requesting title screen” from the client occurs. If you use a custom background, also post the class where that’s loaded.
[/quote]
I’ll PM them to you, as my cacheDownloader is quite extensive and I don’t want it to be leeched.[/quote]
It’s not anything really special

Confirm this: Does the cache download? does the cache extract?
Do this: Replace all instances of ‘\’ and ‘/’ with File.seperator
